Field Documentation

__u8 ah_hdr_struct::ah_data[IPSEC_AUTH_ICV]
 

ICV (Integrity Check Value), variable-length data. 12 bytes (96 bits) for HMAC-SHA1-96 and HMAC-MD5-96

__u32 ah_hdr_struct::spi
